Upcoming vita games
Update this site

Embeds

This is a personal project by M van Eijgen to create a visual pleasing overview of all the Playstation Vita games. This website is hosted on Github and there for easy to update for everyone to edit and update. Head over to the data.yml file hit the edit button and add or update a upcoming game

Launch website

Puzzle
Release date:
99 Bricks Wizard Academy is a fun and fast paced endless physics builder.
